scripts.build: npm run build:cli && npm run build:lsp
scripts.bundle:cli: purs-backend-es bundle-app --corefn-dir output-cli --main Main --platform node --to dist/purelint.js --int-tags
scripts.bundle:lsp: purs-backend-es bundle-app --corefn-dir output-lsp --main Main.LSP --platform node --to dist/purelint-lsp.js --int-tags
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:cli && npm run bundle:lsp
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run bundle
scripts.test:all: npm test && npm run test:lsp && npm run test:vscode
